text: (Napiye!) Ivvare inta kur'anai arapi moliyil nam vahyi mulam umakku arivittom. (Itaik kontu, arapi moli pecum makkavacikalakiya) taynattaraiyum, ataic curriyulla kiramankalil vacippavarkalaiyum, nir eccarittu, anaivaraiyum (vicaranaikkaka) onru cerkkakkutiya nalaip parri accamuttuviraka! Annal varuvatil cantekame illai. (Annalil) oru kuttattar corkkattirkum, oru kuttattar narakattirkum celvarkal
